title: Infiltrate Moonrise Towers
content:
vices, before inviting you for a drink in the inn. Karlach will have an exclamation point over her here if you brought her along. If you talk to her she’ll fangirl over Jaheira. You’ll have an extra choice for dialogue here if you chose Background as a citizen of Baldur’s Gate. Choosing it or asking her if she knows her will have her explain to you the stories of Jaheira’s bravery.

NOTE: Some dialogue interactions will have additional options depending on the Background, Race or Class of your c
